data.label: TapTap 开发者服务
data.description: TapTap 开发者服务（TapTap Developer Services，简称 TDS 服务）旨在帮助开发者降低游戏研发、运营维护等阶段投入的精力和成本。TDS 整合了各项服务，让开发者能够聚焦在游戏核心乐趣的创造上，创作更优秀的游戏，进而促进游戏行业生态的良性循环，最终让开发者与玩家双双受益。

data.label: TapTap 开发者服务
data.description: TapTap Developer Services (TDS) aims to help developers reduce the effort and cost invested in game development, operation, and maintenance stages. TDS integrates various services, allowing developers to focus on creating the core fun of games, creating better games, and promoting a positive cycle of the game industry ecosystem, ultimately benefiting both developers and players.
